projects.title: ML Pipeline Framework
projects.description: Production-ready machine learning pipeline with automated training, evaluation, and deployment workflows. Built to handle large-scale datasets with reproducible experiments.
projects.longDescription: The ML Pipeline Framework is a comprehensive toolkit designed to streamline the machine learning workflow from data ingestion to production deployment. It provides standardized interfaces for data preprocessing, feature engineering, model training, evaluation, and monitoring. The framework supports multiple ML backends including scikit-learn, PyTorch, and TensorFlow, making it versatile for various use cases within the IASD community.

projects.title: NLP Darija Research Toolkit
projects.description: Comprehensive toolkit for natural language processing experiments and research on Moroccan Arabic dialect. Includes tokenization, sentiment analysis, and language models.
projects.longDescription: The NLP Darija Research Toolkit addresses the significant challenge of processing Moroccan Arabic (Darija) — a dialect that blends Arabic, Berber, French, and Spanish influences. Our team has developed specialized tokenizers, pre-trained embeddings, and fine-tuned transformer models for tasks like sentiment analysis, text classification, and named entity recognition in Darija.
highlights: Pre-trained BERT model fine-tuned on Darija corpus
Named entity recognition for Moroccan entities
Open dataset of 50k annotated Darija sentences

projects.title: Data Viz Dashboard
projects.description: Interactive dashboard for visualizing complex datasets with real-time analytics and insights. Built with modern web technologies for seamless data exploration.
projects.longDescription: The Data Viz Dashboard is a full-stack web application that enables researchers and analysts to upload, explore, and visualize complex datasets without writing code. It features an intuitive drag-and-drop interface, a rich library of chart types, and real-time collaboration features. The backend leverages Python data science libraries while the frontend delivers a smooth, responsive experience.
highlights: Export to PNG, SVG, and PDF

projects.title: Computer Vision Lab
projects.description: Experimental platform for computer vision research including object detection, image segmentation, and visual recognition tasks tailored for Moroccan contexts.
projects.longDescription: The Computer Vision Lab provides a shared infrastructure for running CV experiments at scale. It includes pre-configured environments for popular frameworks like OpenCV, YOLO, and Detectron2, along with a dataset repository of locally-collected imagery. The lab has been used to develop models for agricultural monitoring, traffic analysis, and cultural heritage digitization.
highlights: Custom dataset for Moroccan license plate detection

projects.title: Community Platform
projects.description: The very website you're on — an open-source community hub built with SvelteKit, TailwindCSS, and modern web technologies by Master IASD students.
projects.longDescription: The Community Platform is a meta-project: the website itself. It's an open-source SvelteKit application that serves as the hub for the Master IASD community. Built collaboratively by students, it features a blog system, project showcase, member directory, and event calendar. It demonstrates best practices for modern web development and serves as a learning resource.
highlights: Runtime blog system with Markdown support

projects.title: AI Course Assistant
projects.description: An intelligent tutoring system that helps Master IASD students with course material, exercises, and exam preparation using RAG and LLM techniques.
projects.longDescription: The AI Course Assistant is a RAG-based (Retrieval Augmented Generation) tutoring system specifically designed for the Master IASD curriculum. It ingests course materials, lecture notes, and past exam papers to provide contextually accurate answers and explanations. The system can generate practice problems, provide step-by-step solutions, and track student progress.
highlights: RAG pipeline over course PDFs and notes
Exam question generation with difficulty levels
